name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Malice_of_the_Corruptor_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Malice of the Corruptor F
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Malice of the Corruptor F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to inflict moderate negative energy damage and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will trigger roughly 5 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Corruptors and may be slotted into any Corruptor damage power.
display_short_help: Set: Superior Malice of the Corruptor
power_display_names: Superior Malice of the Corruptor: Recharge/Chance for Negative Energy Damage
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for Negative Energy Damage
